content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace used to smelt iron ore with coal into iron plates. This structure underpins further production processes that require iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace used to smelt copper ore with coal into copper plates. The copper plates produced here support the production of items like copper cables needed in higher‐level crafting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Argument Handling
  – Use the correct parameter format when calling get_entities. Avoid unexpected keyword arguments (such as 'radius') or an incorrect number of positional parameters by consulting the function’s signature.
  – Validate that the return value from get_entities is not None before iterating to prevent type errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Dependencies
  – Before attempting to place a lab, confirm that the lab item is available in the inventory.
  – When crafting the lab, ensure that all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available. Address any resource chain gaps through proper resource processing before reattempting lab crafting.

• Resource and Dependency Management
  – Monitor resource availability closely—verify that sufficient iron ore, copper ore, coal, and secondary products are present so that production chains (smelting and crafting) can meet the requirements for advanced structures.
